name: PATHSHALA FUNWALA by AAS
description: EKDUM FREE: Barabanki Aur Sitapur districts ke sarkari schools ki class 6-10 mein padhne wale bachho ke liye Nihar Shanti Pathshala Funwala - AAS Vidyalaya ki taraf se. Aaj hi scholarship ke liye apply karein aur free mein padhe - sab subjects ki saari classes, tests aur teachers se online help.  KYA AAP SARKARI SCHOOL MEIN PADHTE HAIN? YA PHIR AAP HAR ROZ SCHOOL NAHIN JA PAATE HAIN? AAP PADHNA CHAHTE HAIN  LEKIN KYA AAPKE DOUBTS CLEAR KARNE KE LIYE GHAR PE KOI NAHIN HAI?  TO AB CHINTA KI KOI BAAT NAHIN SHANTI DIDI LE AAYI HAIN SCHOOL AAPKE GHAR TAK NIHAR SHANTI PATHSHALA FUNWALA DE RAHA HAI AAPKO ONLINE KABHI BHI KAHIN BHI PADHNE KA MAUKA AUR WHO BHI BILKUL NISHULK JISME GHAR BAITHE AAP CLASS 6 SE 10 TAK KI PADHAI KAR SAKTE HAIN ISME HAIN HAR SUBJECT KI ONLINE CLASSES, TESTS AUR HELP KE LIYE TEACHERS BHI TO DER KIS BAAT KI NIHAR SHANTI PATHSHALA FUNWALA - AAS VIDYALAYA APP ABHI DOWNLOAD KAREIN KYUNKI SCHOOL AB AAPKE POCKET MEIN HAI
